11.content:
Skylar was a young boy, about the age of 16. He has brown eyes, and strange light blue hair. Although he is 16, Skylar spent most of his life as a slave for a king. The King was not evil or cruel, he was nice. It was the King's guards that gave him most of the trouble. The King never knew about it, but he was tortured daily. One day, the King called on Skylar. Skylar walked into the King's throne room and kneeled down.

"You called me sire?" he asked.

"Skylar, you have been my slave for over 13 years" started the King. "You have obeyed every order, completed each task, and did it extremely well. I think it is about time that you deserve some freedom."

"Sire?" Skylar seemed overjoyed.

"Skylar, I am setting you free. There is a family in the next village over that will accpet you. You will be sent there this afternoon."

Skylar jumped up and cheered. Some of the knights walked over and grabbed him.

"How dare you act this way in front of the King!" said the one.

"We should...!"

"Knights! Settle down!" yelled the King. "Skylar is overjoyed. I almost guarantee you that if I said you get unlimited beer for a month you would do the same."

Skylar laughed a little, and the guards backed up. Skylar walked up to the King and shook his hand. "Oh thank you sire!" he said.

"Now now, I'm not your master anymore. You are your own person now. But, if anything is needed, please contact me or the princess."

"Will do my lo...I mean, King Darwin."

Skylar stopped shaking his hand, and left the throne room. Later in the afternoon, Skylar walked outside. A carriage was waiting for him. It wasn't a royal carriage, then it would cause attention. The princess was waiting in front of the carriage. The princess was at the age of 18. She had orange hair, blue eyes, and freckles. She was wearing a long, pink dress, and a gold tiara. Skylar bowed to her before he went into the carriage, and the princess peered in.

"This is all I can do for you now" said the princess. She handed Skylar a smal sac. Skylar slightly opened it, and many gold coins appeared. "This is for you to but some proper clothing when you get to the next village" she continued. "I will miss you Skylar. You were almost a brother to me."

"I will miss you too Princess Izellia" replied Skylar.

The carriage went off, but an the princess waved. When the carriage was out of sight, Isellia stopped and sighed.

"I wish I could tell him that in order to get to the village you need to get through Dridder Swamp" thought Izellia. "Skylar would be very lucky to make it out of that swamp alive."

The carriage rode off. Skylar fell asleep in the carriage. Sudedenly, the carriage jerked and halted to a quick stop. Skylar got up, and looked out. The horse and the carriage driver were gone. Skylar slowly got out and wandered around. He was in a dense, dark, moist forest. He started to walk backwards and look around quickly.

"H-Hello...?" he said weakly.

Skylar backed up into what looked like a giant spider web. Skylar tried to get out, but it was impossible. Above him, came down a...
11.title: Male human

1121.content:
Jade looked down at her web, which was vibrating a lot, She pushed her dark green hair out from in front of her eyes and tried to get a better look. There was a human dressed in rags for clothing. His hair was blue, and he was right beside the carriage. He was screaming for help.

"Where did this human come from?"though Jade. "That one pulling the cart ran off when he saw me, and I grabbed his horse. Maybe this human was in the cart. But, why would the one leave the other?"

Jade slowly crept down the web to approach the human.

---

Skylar kept trying at the web, but he couldn't get off.

"Someone help!" he yelled.

He then felt some other vibrations on the web. He stopped moving, and looked up. There was a creature that had the upper half of a human, but a lower half of a spider. The spider half was green and had eight skinny legs. The human half was obviously female. She had pale skin, dark green hair, and bright green eyes. Her nails were long and were green as well. She had large breasts, even though she had the appearance of a teenager. Skylar did not know what to do, he just stayed there frozen in fear. The creature crept closer to him, where she was within arms length. She then reached her arms out towards Skylar.
1121.title: Jade

11212.content:
The creature reached out and grabbed Skylar by the sides. He remained frozen in fear, unknowing what is to come. The creature slowly turned Skylar, to face her directly. Skylar dared to look, but he did. The creature's eyes seemed to glisten when she stared at him.

Why isn't this thing eating me? Skylar thought. I have never seen this creature, but it sure looks dangerous

Eventually, the creature walked further down the web, and finally placed Skylar down. She released her grip, but Skylar still remained frozen. The creature looked at him worryingly. Finally, she spoke.

"Are you alright?" she asked.

It took Skylar a little, but he finally replied.

"I-I'm f-fine" he muttered. "Wh-Who...Wh-Wh-What...are...you?"

"I'm what sone might call a Dridder. A Dridder is a mythical creature that is half human, half spider. Most of them eat humans as well."

Skylar backed up a little, but the Dridder put her hand on his shoulder. "Don't worry" she said. "I'm not like that. However, I am going through some changes."

"L-Like w-what?" asked Skylar.

"Well, during my teenage years, I will experience some growth spurts. I'm not sure how big I will get, I will get pretty big. My name is Jade."

Jade stuck out her hand. Skylar slowly shook her hand, "I'm Skylar."
11212.title: Short Explanation

112122.content:
"Excuse me Jade" said Skylar more calmly. "Can you tell me where the path to the next village is?"

"Sure" she said cheerfully. "This path will take you to the village. Most of the more violent Dridders are awake at night, so you will be okay. But why were you in that carriage?"

"I was once a slave, but I was released. The King was sending me to the next village to a new family."

"That's odd...I thought everyone knew about the outside path."

"Outside path?"

"There is a path that runs around the outside if the swamp. Dridders never attack outside of their territory, so most travelers take that path. I wonder why you were on this path..."

Skylar didn't know either. Either the king or princess did not know, or they did it on purpose.

No, they would not have done that. The King and Princess loved me. They would never have done that.

The sun started to go down, and Jade looked worried.

"I hope you are not traveling now" she said.

"Well, now I won't" replied Skylar. "Just wish I had somewhere safe to sleep for the night."

"You can stay with me. I sometimes collect stuff from humans that they drop, and I think I have something for you."

Jade reached out and gently grabbed Skylar. Skylar did not move, he knew Jade was not going to hurt him. Jade climbed up her web and entered a large room made entirely out of silk.

"You are very talented" said Skylar.

Jade giggled as she continued down in. In the room of web was a pile of different objects. Jade went threw these objects, and pulled out a bed. It already had sheets on them, but not neatly. She placed the bed down, and Skylar climbed in.

"Thank you" he said.

"No problem" she replied. "I'm just happy that I'm not alone tonight."

Jade crawled up one of the webbing, and quickly fell asleep. Skylar fell asleep as well.

The next morning...
112122.title: Just A Coincedence?

choices: jade and two other female dridder
1121222.content:
as Skylar slowly wakes from his sleep he notices that he is completely wrapped in web the only thing that wasn't covered was his head Skyler then notices something even more scary

(what does he see.)
1121222.title: in jades web

11212222.content:
Skylar panicked as the other two dridders were giggling. one of them was full-bodied, had a good-sized tummy (for a man-eating species that ruled your nightmares), had blue skin, and White hair. the other had grey skin, a huge, bulging stomach, [you figured from many, many humans she gobbled up (recently too!)] and was easily in the CCG (Cute chubby girl) category. The scary thing was that all three were at least twice your size. Skylar was certain that he just became dridder food and his life was over. He almost started crying until you heard Jade's soothing voice. "See girls? This is the guy I was telling you about! Isn't he cute?" the other two giggled again. Skylar was confused "Jade? Is there something I'm missing here?" Jade smirked and said, "Skylar, These are my two friends. This is Kyria" the blue skinned one bowed, saying "Pleased to meet you, handsome. *giggle*" you blushed at her gesture, and Jade continued. "And this is Myrraiah." the bigger one patted your head, and said "You can call me Myrrah, if you'd like, cutie! I KNOW we'll be together for a looooooooooooooooong time!" she kissed Skylar's cheek, and he blushed violently. they giggled again, and Jade told him why they were here. "These two are some of the sweetest dridders in the entire swamp! when i told them about you last night they just HAD to get a look at 'cha!" Jade unwraps your web, and both Myrrah and Kyria hug you tightly.

         Skylar was at ease, finally. "These two look completely harmless. they cant be man-eaters!" he thought. suddenly, Myrrah belched, rubbing her tummy, and saying, "Sorry, pardon me. those humans i ate won't stop kicking!" Skylar's eyes shot open in fear, but Myrrah continued "I wonder who they were after? they said that there was a slave that was hiding in the swamp. something about dragging his dead body on a chain when they found him, they'd drag his corpse back to the king or what not. i don't know. they were tasty after i peeled their shells off!" It hit him like a runaway train. "The driver... he wasn't eaten, he left me in the swamp to die! No! It can't be! Unless... oh, those knights. i should have known they'd do this to me. jealous bastards. I mean i serve for years, yet they get more priveleges than me. and they're STILL jealous? At least i'm better with these three. I mean they ARE pretty nice and cute." As Skylar finished this thought. Myrrah suggested, "Howabout we pay their home a little visit? I mean, they should be nice to us with our cute little friend here!" Myrrah patted his head, and he agreed. "Let's get going, then!" Kyria put Skylar on her back, for him to ride on. and the four of them headed off to the castle of your former servitude.

         A couple hours pass, and the four friends reached the castle. "This is it, my friends. please wait out here while i bring a couple 'friends' out to 'play with you.'" Myrrah smiled and Kyria hugged Skylar. as he headed into the castle, the three dridders decided to tell a ridiculous story to pass the time. "So there's this doctor riding an ice cream cart with wings..." (dridders do tend to have outrageous imaginations). Back in Skylar's point of view, the whole town was carrying on as usual, until the guards saw him; the two that were with Skylar upon his release. the fat one's jaw dropped. "No! Impossible! You should be dead!" the tall one was speechless, but had his hand on his forehead. Skylar was furious, and with good reason, too. "So you admit it! You tried to have me killed! " taking a deep breath, Skylar asked "would you like to see how i survived? You two would never believe this in the least!" snickering, the two leave their posts, and follow Skylar to the gates.

         The three's story was wrapping up, with Kyria as the ending narrator "...when suddenly the artist had a stroke! The glittery monstrosity no longer existed and the doctor was saved. his quest could carry on and THAT would be a story all in itself!" out of ideas at the moment. the three began laughing and laughing and laughing. "this story can really screw someone's brain over!" said Myrrah. Wiping a tear of amusement from her eyes, Kyria responded "Yeah, and what makes this even better? I was writing it as we went along! This was the craziest story since last week. you know, the one with the guy in the world between insanity and reality?" catching her breath, Jade said "I remember. the guys who fought monsters by firing tree stumps when they bent backside first at them. not to mention the snails with jet engines and the random guy on a bumper car popping out of nowhere and in the strangest places. that was classic! If only Sky wa... Oh hey baby!" he smiled as she acknowledged him. Laughing, he said "That story you were telling; i heard bits and pieces of, but it was hilarious!" bowing, Myrrah asked, "Sky, Are these your friends?" becoming angry quickly, he said "far from it! I figured you'd be hungry, so i picked up the two who tried to get me killed!" Kyria's tummy growled, and Jade began sealing them in silk. the men screamed, but it was too late; they were wrapped tight. Kyria grabbed both of them and spoke. "Hey, Myrraiah? which one do you want?" looking at both men, Myrraiah licked her lips and said "i think i want the plump one! just make sure you peel off his shell before enjoying him! they taste so much better that way!" Kyria smiled and began to strip him of his armour (like a peach or a banana). The bigger one began to plea with her. "Please don't eat us! We'll worship you if you spare us!" Myrrah thought for a few seconds, and replied "Sorry, plump little snack. But you tried to leave my friend here for dead! Nothing personal, just family matters. *giggle* ah!" Myrrah dropped the big guy into her mouth, tossing him around with her tongue. "mmmmmmmmm." Myrrah was basking in his flavor, but her stomach demanded that she swallowed. in one gulp, the man's fate was at hand. slowly, but surely, the fat guard slid into Myrrah's belly. with a plop and a gurgle, Myrrah was satisfied. patting her tummy, she sat down and rested.

         Kyria was done peeling the taller guard out of his plates, revealing a skinny, little body. "Awww. not much meat on you. oh well. a snack is still a snack, no matter how scrawny." as she opened her mouth, the man begged Kyria to spare him, promising her his riches. Kyria closed her mouth and listened to him. "If you let me live, i'll make you worth the royalty i serve!" Kyria was interested, and asked "Where is it?" the guard said "it will come soon. please wait with me while it comes?" Kyria smiled, and replied "Deal! and you can wait for it in my tummy! *giggle*" the guard was terrified "No! Please! Don't!" Kyria quickly popped the naked guard into her mouth, and gulped. she burped a little, but it was so cute to Skylar. "Did he taste good, Kyria?" She smiled and said "Oh yes! Very much so! now how about the four of us go home and get you nice, big and strong like us! you can still be a Human if you want!" Skylar was puzzled, as he never knew anything about this sort of thing. "You can actually do that?" Kyria answered "Oh yes, little one! Whenever a dridder meets a special human, we can give them a little nip and they'll grow as we do! You are one VERY lucky human, as only a handful recieve this gift!" Skylar jumped in excitement. and Myrrah, who was watching, said "Then it's settled! let's go home and make you bigger!" So the four of them head off into the swamp, to make Skylar as big as them, and oh so happy with his new family of three gorgeous dridder friends.

         "URP! *giggle* Excuse me!" said Kyria. You smiled at her cuteness, and asked "Kyria, Jade doesn't eat humans, and the three of you are friends. So why do you and Myrrah? I'm not judging; just curious!" Myrrah smiled and explained it clearly to you. "We were taught that humans were the mightiest and best prey in the entire world. However, since we have a human friend, we'll only eat those humans who try to hurt or take you away from us. unless, of course, you're ok with us eating your kind!" Smiling, Skylar admits, "I'm okay with it as long as it's just you guys. I gotta be honest, you two are so adorable when you're nice and full!" Myrrah hugged Skylar tight, and as the sun began to reach it's zenith, they reached home sweet home. Jade was happy, as the past couple days were the best in her life. "Now then, let's get started!" she suggested. Kyria and Myrrah nodded. Skylar was placed in between the three, and his transformation was close at hand. the continuation of Skylar's life, however, is only a matter of "perspective."
11212222.title: Your New Family (An Unusual, yet Exciting One!)

choices: "Is the transformation permenant? Or can I change back into human form?"
112122221.content:
The four arrived at Jade's lair in the swamp a couple hours later. The Dridders had digested their latest meals, and felt energetic. Skylar was again impressed by the fact that the home was made entirely out of spider silk. "We can begin the transformation over here." Jade said as she made for a corner of her lair that had rows of candles, and various potions lining the walls. Why Jade would have lit candles next to the very flammable substance that is spider silk, Skylar had no idea. Maybe Dridder silk was different?

The three Dridder women surrounded Skylar in a triangle formation. Each of them had one of the strange looking potions in their hands.

"Skylar, do you have any questions before we begin?" asked Jade.

"Actually yes." he responded. "I was just wondering...."
112122221.title: Just one Question

choices: Skylar says he wants to be let out
Jade falls asleep and starts to digest Skylar
11212222111.content:
"Do I taste good?" Skylar asked, while looking at Jade.

"Excuse me?" She asked in disbelief.

"I asked: Do I taste good?"

"You want me to taste you?"

"Would you mind?"

Jade didn't know what to say. Up until now, she hadn't eaten a Human before, but now that Skylar asked, her lips moistened at the thought, and she licked them instinctively. He looked tasty in her eyes. "Sure. Do you trust me to swallow you?"

"Of course."

Kyria and Myrrah giggled. Jade was about to eat her first Human, and they got to witness it. Good thing it was happening here, and not out in the swamp without anyone to help Jade in eating Skylar.

Jade approached Skylar and picked him up. She opened her mouth wide, giving Skylar a nice view of her throat. She licked him, enjoying his taste.

"Mmm. You taste good." She said softly.

"Feel free to swallow." He said in a matching tone.

Jade smiled and put Skylar's head into her mouth. The taste of his full head giving her a much better feeling than just a small section of it. She swallowed up to his shoulders, feeling his taste through his clothing. She swallowed again, and was up to his chest. Her friends holding him steady as she swallowed.

Skylar didn't struggle at all during this. He actually found it to be strangely pleasant I never thought I would enjoy this... Her throat had looked so inviting, and her tongue felt nice along his skin. The warm confines of her mouth and throat soothed him. It wasn't long before all of him was curled up inside her stomach. He found it to be quite comfortable and ran his hand along Jade's stomach wall.

Jade let out a small burp and patted her belly."Mmmm. You were really good, Skylar. Thanks for letting me eat you." She yawned. Signaling her body's need for rest while it tried to digest it's newest meal. "Let me know when you want out. I doubt you want to be digested."

"You're right about that. I'll let you know when I'm ready to come back up. It's kinda nice in here."

Jade blushed, and her friends giggled. "oh, Humans." Myrrah said in a joking tone.
11212222111.title: Taste Test

choices: "You will beable to change back." (Do not add)
1121222212.content:
"is the transformation permident or can I change back?"
"Well..."
1121222212.title: The Transformation

1142.content:
Skylar's eyes were locked onto the massive creature that descended upon him. It was at least 90 feet tall, and and had the lower body of a brown spider. But, her upper body was that of a human, and a young woman at that. Her skin was pale, her breasts fair, and she had long black hair that fell along her back. As she drew closer, he looked straight into her red eyes, which glimmered with amusement. The terror of seeing something like this was paralyzing, he couldn't move. He wanted to scream, but his throat was frozen too. She finally reached him, and reached down to grab him. His heart rate shot up as he saw the giant palm coming towards him. It seemed to grow bigger as it took up his entie field of vision. She gently curled her fingers around him and picked him off the web, leaving only his head exposed from her hand. She gave a gentle smile and spoke.
"Hello there little human, are you alright?" Her voice was soothing, but he was still terrified of her.
"I-I-I-I'm f-f-fine...w-w-w-what are y-you?"
"Me? I'm a dridder, and my name is Marie. What about you?"
"Skylar..."
"You got lucky little guy, if you ended up in any other web you probably would have been dead. Most dridders eat humans on the spot." That sent shivers up his spine. These giant creatures ate humans...but she didn't.
"S-s-so...you don't want to eat me?"
"Nope!"
"Then...you don't like their taste?"
1142.title: Friends?

11421.content:
“I never said that,” Marie smiled.

Skylar gulped, “But-t you said yo-ou wouldn’t eat me…”

Marie untangled Skylar and held her before her bust. “True I said I wouldn’t.” She held a playful smile. “And don’t worry I won’t.”

Skylar breathed a sigh of relief as he held over the drider’s breasts. “But what are you going to do with me?”

“Well,” Marie giggled. “You are coming with me.”

“Wait what?” Skylar gasped with worry. “But! I was going to head to the village near by!”

“Then why didn’t you take the long route?” Marie asked.

“But the king loves me! He would never try to!”

She sighed. “He must have lied to you.” Marie said. ‘Poor human.’ “Well you are lucky I found you. Otherwise you would have been eaten.” She reminded him as she held Skylar in her hand. “Your best bet is to live with me.” She told him.

Skylar gulped. “F-fine…” He sighed. “But… I can be allowed to live the swamp. Right?”

“In time,” Marie nodded. ‘Now where to put you?’ She thought. ‘Wait I know where.’ She then informed him. Alright I need to put you away for a bit while I hunt.” Without waiting for him to respond she put him away….
11421.title: "I never said that..."(Playful)

1143.content: She looks down at you hungerly. Licking her lips, she grabs you and tosses you into her mouth, gulping you down instantly, belching as her stomach processes you.
1143.title: writers chioce

12.content:
Kira ran across the field, hearing the clank of armor and the pound of hoof beats behind her. An onlooker to the scene could tell by the clothes Kira wore over her pale skin that she was a runaway slave. The rag-like dress was the only thing in her appearance that really determined her class. Even with her hard life she was quite pretty.

But she’d had enough of being a slave and ran for it. And right then, as she glanced back at her pursuers, it seemed she wasn’t going to see freedom for a very long time.


Kira’s eyes were still on her pursuers when the field was replaced by trees far softer ground.

“She’s gone into the shwamp shir.” She heard a slurring man say.

She heard a horse whinny as it was pulled into a stop, “She’s as good as dead then. Let’s head back men, no slave’s worth going in there for.”

Kira slid to a stop as she heard her pursuers leaving. She’d gotten away, she was free! But then she noticed where she was. Many explorers that came by the castle she was a slave at told terrifying tales of the swamp, saying that horrifying creatures lived there that would enjoy tearing apart and devouring human flesh. Like everyone else she dismissed those tales as silly and childish, now that she was actually in the swamp the tales seemed all too realistic.

Knowing that only slave-hood awaited her if she went back, Kira started forward.


Kira had been walking for about an hour when she ran into…
12.title: Kira

choices: The dridder isn’t one to be afraid of
The dridder is one to be feared
121.content:
Kira didn’t see the web until she felt it on her skin. She struggled and pulled trying to free herself, but all she achieved was tangle herself in it more.

“Well now, what do we have here?” A sultry female voice pondered above her.

Kira looked up as best she could and nearly fainted in terror. The creature was gigantic, at least 70 feet tall; it looked like a naked woman from her waist and sex up, but below that was the gargantuan black body of a spider. “Oh my gods, a giant dridder.” Kira squeaked.

The dridder smiled as she bent her spider legs and lowered herself to get a better look at her catch. “Hmm… a fine specimen, for a human at least…” she mumbled as she back legs gathered silk from her abdomen.

“Please, let me go. I didn’t mean to intrude on your territory or anything. I, I…” Kira stuttered in fear before the dridder plucked her from the web and wrapped her silk around the terrified human.
121.title: A gigantic web

1212.content:
Kira could do nothing as she was tied up by the dridder. Kira closed her eyes in fear as she swayed from the single strand on silk the dridder kept in her hand, letting Kira sway by and get a close look at her exposed torso. After that bit of fun the dridder went off on her eight spider legs to her home.

Kira opened her eyes when they reached the large cave the dridder lived in. Webs covered every surface, designed by the dridder herself to her liking. There were about dozen semi-cocoons like the one she was trapped in now, and about nine of them had people in them; another was even occupied by a lady elf. She seemed to be the only calm one; some of the captives wept in despair, others begged for release, and others still were too frightened to even speak.

The dridder fastened Kira’s cocoon to the webbing, conveniently next to the elf before heading deeper into the cave.

“Welcome to the ‘Spider’s Lair’ as I like to call it. My name’s Aziya.” The elf said.

“I’m Kira. Wh-what’s going to happen to me?” Kira asked nervously.

“That depends on what Violet, the dridder that caught us all and lives here, decides to do with you. She may keep you as you are like a trophy, she may use you for her sexual pleasure, she may keep you as a slave, or she may eat you. I was the first being she caught when she was first hunting, so she’s kept me as a memento of that day. Since that day I’ve watched her build her home and have seen hundreds of people come through here, but none of them have left. They’ve all been eaten or died whenever Violet was too rough on them.” Aziya said.

Kira didn’t like the sound of any of those possibilities, especially the salve one. She’d just gotten away from one cruel overlord, she didn’t want to be under another.

“Look on the bright side, she placed you near me. That may be a sign that you’ll live a relatively long time here.” Aziya said comfortingly.

“I hope you’re right.” Kira moaned.


For several days Kira nervously anticipated the time when Violet would do something with her, but that time didn’t seem to be anytime soon. Violet would come by every-so-often, but only to gaze at Aziya for a time before leaving. During those days Kira and Aziya became good friends.

But one morning Violet came to their area with plans in her mind.


What are those plans?
1212.title: The Spider’s Lair

12123.content:
Violet had another cocoon and this one was an unconscious man. Violet placed him next to Kira and left. It wasn't long before the man started to wake up.

"Ugh, what happened? where am I?" he asked. It was obvious he wasn't aware of the current situation. "Your in the 'Spider's Lair'" Aziya said. The man soon came to his senses before he said anything.

"Hmm, this must be what the people said the Dridder lives. It was noted that this swamp was bound between time." He said. The man had black hair and brown eyes. He looked 18. "Since I’m going to be here until that 'Thing' comes for me, I might as well introduce myself properly. My names Ian, World-famous mystery explorer" He said with pride.

"Never heard of you" Aziya said. "Neither have I" Kira agreed. It was true, neither Aziya nore Kira have heard of this man and yet he calls himself "World-famous". He looked at both Kira and Aziya.

"Well, like I said, this swamp is bound between time. It could be thousands of years until you start hearing about me in Average time. Anyway, I was asked to come here about some strange disappearances and wanted me to investigate. Infact, I’m taping this while we're talking, just to make the show better." He said. There was a small device attached to his shoulder that had a small dim red light on the corner. Kira looked at it and wondered if this would be her document before if she dies or not.

"Well, I can't stay here forever, I got a show to put together and a home to go to." With that the man struggled abit before a silver-like blade poked out of the spider silk. He motioned it back and forth until the silk-cocoon was opened. He jumped out and landed on the ground with a light 'thud'. He then dusted himself then started to walk away.

"Wait! your not just going to leave us here, are you?" kira yelled. Ian turned around and took out his blade. "You want out? if I do yoll better to cause me any trouble or delay." He yelled. He started to climb the silk-covered walls and started to cut through your silk-cocoon then Aziya's. Both of them fell out and waited for Ian to come down. "Now, lets hurry before we get caught by the dridder." He said. The three of them started to walk until they found what seemed to be the exit of the giant cave.

"There it is, the exit! Ready to smell some fresh air?"
12123.title: Something else

121231.content:
"Soo, You thought you could get away" the Drider.
Then Ian was hit by silk, and dropped his knife. "run" he yelled.

The other two ran ,but Violet was standing in front of the two, Both of them tried to dodge her hands. But Kira was grabbed by her right hand Aziya with left. She covered Aziya back in a cocoon. "Now back to what i was going to do."

Then Violet injected something into Kira. Then all blacked out for her.
When she woke up, she was in the caves floor. "Hey, help me Kira" She looked up but was in great burning pian. She saw Aziya in a cocoon hanging from the ceiling. "Hey," studdered Kira "where's Ian?" "I ate him," said violet as she walked in. then suddenly Kira screamed in pain. "So the vemin, is working" luaghed Violet. "I can't wait to see what happens."

<I>Wiat what?</I> Thought Kira.

Kira didn’t know what was wrong with her. All she knew was that Violet injected her with some kind of venom and she herself was now in agony. She squeezed her eyes shut, hoping to block out the pain, but it didn’t help her from feeling like her writhing insides were burning.
Aziya saw everything that Kira couldn’t. She saw Violet gazing upon the screaming girl with a smile. And she saw what was happening to Kira. Aziya watched in horrified awe as Kira’s legs disappeared; replaced by a black spider-like body, and as eight thin but strong spider legs grew from the body.

Kira had passed out when she couldn’t withstand the pain any longer; when she awoke she knew something was wrong.

the cry started to tick off Violet after a few minutes. I can't take it! "If I give you Aziya." That line made Aziya looked shocked and happy.

121231111.title: op.1

1212312.content:
Kira let out another scream, this one sounded more painful than the first to Aziya. Then Kira lay still, breathing heavily as Violet approached. Kira tried to get up and run, but her body wouldn’t respond. “Oh no, I can’t move!” She shouted in terror.
“And that is how it should be.” Violet said as she stopped just above Kira, “If you had stayed where I put you, you would have been a lot happier. But now, I’m going to have to punish you; else all my captures will try to escape.”
“You won’t hurt Aziya, will you?” Kira asked, concerned for her friend.
Violet reached down and grabbed the immobile Kira, raising her to face level. “Aziya is a special case for me, she will not be harmed.” Kira was slightly relieved, but she still feared for her own safety.
“Miss Violet, please don’t be too hard on her. She is only human.” Aziya said, Kira knew she didn’t mean anything as an insult.
“I’ll consider it, my pet. But now I had best take care of your punishment.” Violet said, first to Aziya then to Kira.

Dora was a dridder that loved to help everyone she could.Dora was a very sexy dridder with her massive F-cup breast and perfect figure.Her hair was black with red bangs.Her skin was a light tan color with no marks or scars on it.Her lower body was that of a orb spider.It was all black with small red lines on it.Her legs where thin but strong.She even had a second stomach in her spider half.But her eyes where the most beutiful thing about her.Her eye glowed a bright red even in the dark and very beautiful and she was only 16.But being a dridder most humans saw her as a monster,but she doesn't eat hemans.

Dora lived on the edge of the swamp.Just outside her home was a town full of farms.Dora loved to watch the humans from a tree top above her house.Dora even learned how to talk just like a human.One day Dora was very hungry and noticed that one of the farms had new pigs out feeding.Dora new that stealing was wrong but was very hungry.Dora made her way out to the edge of the woods and walked out into the open.As she walked up to the farm she saw meny pigs walking around.She walked up to the fence and climbed over it.The pigs must have seen her becuse thay all ran into the barn.Dora walked into the barn trying not to be seen.Inside was meny pigs,but also a human girl that looked 14.The girl looked over at Dora and started to scream.

"Ahhhhh!A dridder!Someone help!"The girl screamed.

131.title: Dora

1312.content:
Anna, the girl that Dora captured, gazed at the dridder with wide, fearful eyes. She had heard all sorts of terrifying stories of the dridders that live in the swamps near the farm she lived and worked at. There was still webbing over her mouth so she couldn’t yell for help or beg for the dridder’s mercy.

Dora gazed at the human girl. She could tell the girl was frightened, given the rate she was breathing. “Don’t worry, I’m not going to harm you.” Dora said softly as she caressed the girl’s cheek. She saw the girl’s eyes take on a confused expression, obviously she didn’t expect this or was wary of deception. Though Dora had no intention of harming the young girl, she couldn’t simply let her go; she’d tell the other humans about her and they’d hunt her down. Dora needed to do something with this girl, but what?
1312.title: Captured

Dora doesn't want to chance it and keeps Anna.Another humen girl looks for Anna.
13121.content:
Dora thought for a minute and finally decided what to do with the girl she had stolen from the farm.

"I'm going to untie your mouth now.If you yell for help then I'm going to have to tie you up again.Do you understand?"Dora said.

The girl agreed and Dora removed the web from her mouth.

"Please don't eat me.I'm only 15,I can't die like this!"The girl said trying not to be to loud.

"It's OK,I won't eat you.I don't even like humens that much."Dora said.

"But don't dridders love humens?"The girl asked.

"It true.Every dridder I know would have eaten you by now.But I don't like humens at all.I love eating the pigs you humens have."Dora said.

Anna was shocked.Dora was a nice dridder but didn't want Anna to tell anyone.So Now she was a dridders pet.Not how she planned to live her life but she wasn't going to give up.

Dora looked at Anna.Anna was right and that means that the humens might come and find her and hurt her.But if Anna tells them then she wouldn't get to eat.Dora didn t know what to do.....

13122.title: Make Anna her daughter

132.content:
Jennifer was sitting on her web. She had just caught her early afternoon meal and was enjoying their struggles in her stomach.

Her upper half was completely bare. Her skin had a slight bluish tint to it. Her breasts were perky and full, and they had caught the eye of more than one male in her experience. Human and Elf alike.It's this natural distraction that has helped her catch a meal more than once. Her face had the appearance of a woman in her early to mid twenties. Her hair was dark brown and went down to her shoulders. Her face was clear, and was complemented by her captivating green eyes. Were she not a Dridder, she would certainly be one of the most beautiful women that ever lived.

Her lower half though, naturally struck fear into the heart of any Human or Elf that spotted her. It was completely black, save for the one blue stripe on her back and underbelly. Her legs were segmented, and somewhat short. They had no hair on them as she relied on hearing, smell, and instinct to survive. She had heard once that she was nicknamed "The Blue Death". Infamous for devouring anyone who was unfortunate enough to be caught in her web. She liked that.

She turned her head to the Human that was cocooned to her web. The emotion of fear very clear on his face.

"She was quite tasty."She said in a voice calm as her expression. "But don't worry, you'll get your turn soon. For now, I suggest you just sit tight." She winked at him. "And don't look at me like that. Being tasty is nothing to be ashamed of."

The webbing was over his mouth, so all he could do was say something incomprehensible.

Jennifer grew tired. She decided that a brief nap would help her digest her latest catch. She folded her legs under her abdomen and fell asleep to the pleasant struggles of her prey inside of her. She smiled to herself. Leaving the young man beside her little hope for survival.

***

Only an hour later, Jennifer awoke to vibrations on her web. She opened her eyes to see...
132.title: Meet Jennifer

1321.content: Jennifer opened her eyes and saw another standing in front of her. They were...
1321.title: Friend or Foe?

1322.content: Jennifer woke to find a Human in her presence. It was...
1322.title: Another Meal?

13222.content:
A young woman was seen struggling in the web. She was a petite brunette with hazel eyes and, judging by the basket on the ground, had been out collecting herbs when she had fallen victim to the web.

Jennifer couldn't believe her luck this day. She had already eaten one victim and had another snared in her web. And now she had another little fly in her web. Not wanting to waste any time, Jennifer quickly scuttled down the web towards the trapped woman.

The woman continued to struggle mightily against the sticky strands, until she could feel vibrations that were quickly intensifying. She gulped and looked up to confirm her worst fears. Jennifer came closer and began to slow down as he got closer. When she came face to face with the ensnared woman, the poor girl tried to back her head away as much as possible. Jennifer grabbed her by the sides of the head and forced her to look into her eyes.

Jennifer smiled and said, "My oh my. Aren't you a pretty looking little fly?"

Jennifer sniffed the air around the girl and added, "And a delicious smelling one at that."

The girl began to whimper and trembled as tears began to form in her eyes.

Jennifer frowned and in a mocking tone said, "What? No begging for your life? No pleading or bartering with me."

She wouldn't have listened to them anyway as she had little use for material goods and it wasn't like her to let fresh meat go. At any rate, the girl's whimpering and tears were enough for her.

In the end, Jennifer shrugged and said, "Oh well then. If you won't answer me, we might as well get started."
13222.title: A female

choices: "Visit your place now. I'd honestly like to get to know you better..."
"Get on my way now. Thanks  for your help though, Rina."
Just then, another dridder shows up and interupts their conversation!
133.content:
Rina was a peaceful dridder. A GIANT peaceful dridder who stood at an amzing 150 feet tall! Despite her huge size, however, Rina always felt that it was wrong to pick on anyone just because they were smaller than her. She had carved out a fairly good reputation for herself, and many humans came to her for assistance if they were being tailed by a massive predator. Of course, not everyone knew that she was peaceful. There were still plenty of people who had never even heard of her, and as such were incredibly intimidated by her. The human that she was about to meet was one of these.

It all started as an ordinary day. Rina was out hunting for some deer that she could have for dinner. Being the gentle soul that she was, Rina would never eat a human, and deer were just as filling as far as her appetite went. They had become a staple of her diet, as they were fairly common in the woods next to the swamp she lived in.

As Rina was searching for a snack, she saw a plume of smoke poking above the treetops. She immediately recognized it as the smoke from a human's campfire. Rina had lived in this swamp for her entire life, and over that time, she had learned that many other dridders saw the smoke from campfires as a giant sign saying "Eat Me!". She knew that whoever this human was, they were in trouble.

Being the compassionate creature that she was, Rina immediately set out in the direction of the smoke to rescue the human. She eventually came to a large clearing, where she saw a small tent and other camping equipment set up. The one thing that she didn't see, however, was the human camper. Just as she was starting to wonder if she was too late, Rina saw some movement coming from the tent. She carefully picked it up and dumped the human inside of it out onto the palm of her hand.

The young human woman was absolutely terrified, and began to cower in fear. Rina tried to stroke her back with her index finger to calm her down, but the human only got more scared.

"P-please Miss Dridder, don't eat me!"

"Don't worry little human, I'm not going to eat you."

"Then why did you capture me like this?"

"Well, you see... Most dridders aren't as nice as I am. That campfire of yours is basically a signal to tell them where they can find a free meal! Speaking of which..."

Rina then bent down so that her head was only a few inches away from the ground, and proceeded to blow out the campfire like a birthday candle.

"There, that's much better. Now anyone who saw that smoke will know that someone else already got to you. By the way, my name is Rina."

"Ummm... Thanks, I guess... My name is Elisa."

"Nice to meet you, Elisa!"

Rina then extended her index finger down for a 'handshake'. Elisa grabbed it and returned the gesture.

"So Miss Rina, if you don't mind me asking... Why did you help me? Don't most dridders eat humans?"

"Oh, you can just call me Rina. Well, to answer your question, yes... Most dridders do eat humans. Personally, I never really saw what was so enjoyable about it. After all, it would be cruel to take the life of another sentient being just for a snack! Your species doesn't taste that good either..."

"You mean that you have eaten a human before?!"

"Oh, no! I've tasted one out of curiosity once, but I've never actually eaten one. Please don't be afraid..."

"Well... Alright... So Rina, what are you going to do with me now?"

"I was thinking that I would just let you go on your way, but you're welcome to come with me to visit my home if you want... I always enjoy making new friends!"

"Hmmm... Well... I think that I'd like to..."
133.title: A not so itsy-bitsy spider...

The new dridderw close to Rina size but was clealy a difrent breed her spider parts wher not that of a orb spider (there the like black widowes or other web spiners) but insted it was thicke strunger looking and covered in fur (like a tralachal) its body had a white and black pattern with a red dimond on her thoraxe, her uper body was well endowed and toned, her hair on her head was red and short and of her eyes was missing scared over the other her remaing left eye was gold and had a glosed over look like she didn't cear any more. Rina was shocked by the new comers emotionless blasay aditued. And Elisa in Rinas hand was shaking with fear witch truned to pure terror when the other dridders stomach grouled. Rina truned he body and coverd Elisa "No and nither are you!" Said Rina with some force in her voice.

The new comer looked at Rina then Elisa then asked. "Is she you CO?"

Rina looked at her and was puzzled and asked back. "My what?"

"Your Comanding Officer." She ansered with out bating her eye.

Rina was vary counfused now. Elisa looked at the other dridder and noticed the clothing and said "I think the taters of cloth are the remains of a uniform."

Rina Blinked and then spoke "Im not eating her caues eating people is wrong and she my new friend. But what Elisa said are you a solder of some kind?"

The whole time Airyle didn't take her eye of Elisa. She then lunges for her with out warning.

135.content: More choices for alternate story lines. You can never have too many spaces for new ideas.

15.title: More options

152.content:
Arianna kept her eyes forward as she walked along the wood lined path through the swamp. Though she could almost feel the dozens of eyes watching her she kept walking forward, making sure to keep the white flag of truce she carried in sight of those eyes. It seemed like a lifetime ago that her father, the king, had declared war on the dridders that lived in the swamp she now trekked through. But the war hadn’t gone well for the humans, the dridders were too strong, smart, and knew the terrain of their swamp too well.

Now it came down to her to make peace. Her father did not like the idea, but in the end he agreed sending her would get the best results, as the dridders had more respect for females.


Soon the village of web-domes that the dridders lived in came into view. No sooner had she taken another step toward the village when an armored dridder leaped from a tree directly into her path. “Who are you, and what do you want, human?” The dridder growled, Arianna couldn’t tell if it was male or female.

“I am Princess Arianna,” Arianna said, trying to sound as important as she could, “I have come to speak with your leader to bring an end to our war.”

The dridder looked at her for a long time, before nodding. “Very well, follow me.” It said before turning and heading for a large web-dome at least three-times the size of the others. Arianna dutifully obeyed and followed. Soon they entered to web, Arianna was amazed by the structure. “Wait here.’ The dridder eventually said, stopping and pointing to the ground, “Our negotiator will come shortly.”

Arianna nodded as the dridder vanished into a hole in a nearby wall. She waited for what felt like an eternity, but it would be worth it to end the war. In due course another dridder emerged from the hole. To Arianna, it appeared to be…
152.title: Female human

choices: "...As a present for my upcomng wedding."
1521.content:
The chamber was empty and remained so for a good ten to fifteen minutes, before the wooden doors behind her were shut. Two guards stood before them, spears in hand as if they were expecting trouble. Ahead through more elegant looking doors emerged a high classeddridder with an air around her, that said she was not to be messed with.She was extraordinarily beautiful dridder, her pink lips were pursed and she seemed to be inspecting her. The dridder cleared her throat, holding out her hand "I see you have a message for me, be a dear and hand it over."

Arianna remembered the scroll with her that explained her presence. She pulled the scroll out of her bag and handed it to the dridder with a small bow.

The dridder took it with a firm nod, she unlaced the scroll and rolled it out before her. For a logn time she read it, every so often she would look away and glance at Arianna. Eventually the dridder woman smiled, showing off a pair of fangs, "My name is Yue young Arianna, don't worry your name is metnioned here" she says gesturing to the scroll. Yue aproached the elf princess, her spider like legs making small sounds against the ground below. "According to this scroll your father sent you as..."
1521.title: The dridder queen herself

15212.content:
“N-no, no this can’t be!” she said, softly at first but growing louder, “My father would never do something like this, certainly not with me!” But she knew how hallow the words sounded, her relationship with her father wasn’t that good, but still she never thought it was so bad he’d give her away.

"There's realy no point in arguing." Yue adjusts the scroll for Arianna to see, "see for yourself my dear."

For a moment Arianna simply gazed at the scroll with her jaw hanging open. The scroll was indeed written in her father’s script, and everything the dridder said was there.

"Sorry but you are mine now, to do with as I please" Yue says coming behind Arianna and lifting her up unexpectedly, carrying her bridal style as she scuttled forward "I shall be taking my gift up to my room guards, do not to disturb me." Yue says to the dridder guards before she takes off out of the hall, carrying the elf princess with her.
15212.title: "...As a present for my upcomng wedding."

1522.content:
The dridder that strode from the hole was obviously royalty, given the way she carried herself. Arianna had seen that composure in her father and many other rulers she met. Though it was equally obvious that this wasn’t the dridders’ queen, she didn’t match the description.

“Princess Arianna, I am Zanik, princess of the dridder people. I apologize that my mother, the queen, isn’t here herself; she is off fighting with the troops against your people.” the dridder said with a slight bow.

Arianna returned the bow, and was surprised by Zanik’s general attitude towards here. Zanik was talking to her like an equal rather than something that crawled out of a bog, not like virtually every other dridder she encountered. “I greet you in return Princess Zanik. I have come to negotiate peace between our two peoples.”

“Yes, your guide told me. Come, let us go somewhere more private to discuss put peace agreement.” Zanik said before leading Arianna deeper into the web.


The negotiations with Zanik went better, and longer than Arianna expected. It was night by the time Arianna and Zanik finished talking, since the swamp was more dangerous by night than it was by day Zanik insisted that Arianna stay there for the night.

Later that night Arianna heard voices outside her room. But she paid them no heed.
It was Zanik and a pair of dridder gaurds that were talking outside Arianna’s room. “Alright let’s go over the plan one last time.” Zanik said

“We both head for the human city, delivering the treaty to their king. We’ll tell him that we were attacked by the beasts of the swamp on our way there and that the human princess was killed by the beasts.” The first guard said.

“Then during the night we sneak into the king’s chambers and kill him.” The second guard said with eagerness.

“Good, make sure you’re just seen not captured. Meanwhile I’ll deal with the human princess. Without their leaders the humans will be quick to fall.” Zanik finished.

Whose plan is this?
1522.title: The dridders’ princess

15221.content:
“My mother never could have thought of such a brilliant plan. If she had listened to me even once we’d have won this war long ago.” Zanik growled.

“Regardless Your Majesty, after this scheme you shall be the queen.” One of the guards said.

“You’re right… You’re right.” Zanik said taking several deep breaths to calm down, “After this I’ll rule the didders and the humans. “Now then, you two will head out in the morning. I’ve got a princess to take care of.”


Zanik silently made her way to the sleeping Arianna and smiled, it was almost too easy.



Zanik can do one of these things:
1) She simply eats Arriana
2) She unbirths Arianna, planning to make Arianna a dridder and her daughter
15221.title: Zanik’s Plot

152212.content:
Arianna was suddenly startled awake as she felt a sharp pain her neck. Almost as if a couple of pins had been stuck in her. As she felt some thing pull out, she looked up to see Zanik standing over her with a look of satisfaction on her face.

Arianna grabbed the spot where she had been bit and tried to back away from the dridder princess. Here the pain began to grow worse.

"What did you just do to me?" Arianna quivered as Zanik came closer to her.

Zanik brought her face close to Arianna's and said, "Just relax. I'm only giving you a better life."

Zanik's words didn't calm Arianna down. In fact they had the opposite effect. She didn't even want to know what Zanik had done to her, but knew whatever was going to happen will happen regardless of what she felt. She curled into a ball closed her eyes to help calm herself before becoming immobile. For Zanik, this was perfect and saved her some trouble. She backed away as the transformation began.

Zanik watched carefully as she knew the process would be...
152212.title: Unbirth her

1522121.content:
Arianna jolted when she felt some pain running through her legs. She quickly glanced to see they were starting to fuse into one. She looked away and began to sob out of pain and fear.

Zanik scuttled a little closer and said, "Don't be afraid. Once the change is complete, the pain will fade away."

As her legs were becoming one, the shape of them started to become a little more round. As Arianna looked through her teary eyes, she noticed that Zanik was starting to seem a little bigger as well. She took a quick look at her hand and realized that it was looking a little smaller as well.

"I'm shrinking?" Arianna gasped out.

Zanik shook her head and said, "You're not shrinking. Your age is just regressing."

"WHAT DID YOU DO!" Arinanna managed to scream out and began to sob.

Hearing Arianna's cries actually began to get to Zanik a little bit. She thought she'd enjoy seeing the human princess squirm, but knowing what Arianna's future held really altered perception of Arianna completely. She went right over to Arianna and placed a hand on her shoulder to comfort her.

"Shh. It'll be okay. Once you're transformation is complete, you will feel better. I promise," Zanik said and then planted a little kiss on Arianna's forehead.

Strangely enough, this seemed to do the trick. Arianna began to sit back and let the tears stop flowing as much. Her legs were completing their fusion and were beginning to round off into the shape of a spider abdomen. Just as that finished, eight spindly legs suddenly emerged from the underside of the abdomen causing a new wave of pain for her. It didn't last long however as at this point the pain became too much for her and she passed out. She continued to shrink as her body then began to take on a bright glow. Zanik looked away for a moment due to the brightness. But as she looked back, she was overjoyed by what she saw.
1522121.title: Painful

choices: … “I’m going to deal with the princess instead.”
… “Don’t have too much fun with the princess.”
15222.content:
“Ah, about to start my plan into motion are you?” the dridder queen said as she came to where Zanik and the guards were talking. Zanik had lied about her not being at the village, there wer no battles being fought that day.

“Yes Mother. I was just about to deal with the human princess.” Zanik replied with a smile.

“Good, good. You two shall be rewarded greatly when the plan succeeds. And if by some misfortune you don’t make it back you families shall receive your reward.” The queen said to the two soldiers.

“Thank you Queen Zarinia.” One said as they both bowed.

“You’re dismissed.” Zarinia said. As the two dridders left Zarinia turned to her daughter, “One more thing Zanik…”

“Yes Mother?” Zanik inquired.

Zarinia replied…
15222.title: The Dridder Queen’s plan

155.content: Last round of writer given storylines
155.title: Still more options

info.brief_description: What happens when humans tread into the realm of dridders? You decide.
info.description:
This is pretty much like my Naga's Forest interactive, but with spider people like these http://www.felarya.com/wiki/images/1/12/Dridderwiki.jpg
The rules are basically the same:

The dridders are about a big as a normal humans, unless otherwise noted in the story
No one-liners
Not too descriptive sex allowed
No scat; if it goes into the sewer DO NOT write about it

(I reserve the right to edit and/or delete chapters)
